https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A documentary crew returns to the shooting locations of Sam Peckinpah's legendary western to reflect on the film and the way it impacted their lives. A Simple Adventure Story: Sam Peckinpah, Mexico and The Wild Bunch
